sentence.Network_en: From ingrained habit he paused to straighten up the bed.

sentence.Network_cn: 挺直双腿直至完全伸展开。

sentence.Network_en: A few sessions talking to a counsellor should straighten him out.
sentence.Network_cn: 跟辅道员谈几次就会使他改正过来的.

entry.def: If you straighten something, you make it tidy or put it in its proper position.

example.ex: She sipped her coffee and straightened a picture on the wall.
example.tran: 她抿了口咖啡，然后把墙上的一幅画扶正。
收拾、摆放靠垫和整理杂志

entry.def: If you are standing in a relaxed or slightly bent position and then you straighten, you make your back or body straight and upright.

example.ex: The three men straightened and stood waiting.
example.tran: 3 个男人挺直身体，站着等候。

entry.def: If you straighten something, or it straightens, it becomes straight.

example.ex: Straighten both legs until they are fully extended...
example.tran: 挺直双腿直至完全伸展开。

example.ex: The road straightened and we were on a plateau.
example.tran: 路变直了，我们驶上了高原。

means.word_mean: 1. straighten up or out; make straight
3. get up from a sitting or slouching position;

sentences.sentence: "The students straightened when the teacher entered"

auth_sentence.content: You can neither straighten their noses, nor...rectify their dispositions.
auth_sentence.res_content: You can neither straighten their noses, nor...rectify their dispositions.

auth_sentence.content: We can't even straighten the track between Boston and Washington.
auth_sentence.res_content: We can't even straighten the track between Boston and Washington.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We can't even straighten the track between Boston and Washington.

auth_sentence.content: Will your ignorance ever straighten itself out?
auth_sentence.res_content: Will your ignorance ever straighten itself out?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Will your ignorance ever straighten itself out?

sentences.en: After the bridge, the road straightens out.
attempts to straighten out the river

means.word_mean: 帮人(或自行)解决问题；(使某人)重回正轨

sentences.en: A few sessions talking to a counsellor should straighten him out.
sentences.cn: 跟辅道员谈几次就会使他改正过来的。

means.word_mean: 解决问题(或困难)；清理；整顿

sentences.en: I was left to straighten out the mess.
sentences.cn: 只留下我来收拾这个烂摊子。

sentences.en: He’s trying to straighten out his finances.
sentences.cn: 他正试图理清他的财务。

means.word_mean: 挺直身子； 站立起来

sentences.en: She slowly straightened up and rubbed her back.
sentences.cn: 她慢慢站起来揉了揉背。

sentences.en: We’d better straighten up the house before they get back.
sentences.cn: 我们最好在他们回来之前把房子收拾好。
